comments.author: notocactus
comments.body: Your list is less completed than 2023 List Bitcoin Mixers Bitcoin Tumblers Websites.The given list has information for best, good and scam mixers in a long history. The post for scam mixers initially was part of that thread with a lo of scam mixers and phishing sites.

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: Thank you for the long list, I believe the information contained in the OP will most beneficial to those who make use of crypto mixers in their transactions, as for me, I've never used a mixer before and I don't have any plans of ever using any.Crypto mixer scam as well as cloud mining scam are types of scam that i believe are spearheaded by the same group of people, it is very important for any one that makes use of this services to watch it and be very careful in other never to be a victim to any of this.

comments.author: BitcoinGirl.Club
comments.body: Network of scam sites mixersComplete list of online scams (Crypto Mixer) from the same familyBoth created in a tine difference of 4 days, both newbie accounts. It does not look like a genuine topic but a way to fish merit. OP, If you really have anything about to contribute in mind then find the appropriate topics and contribute there. Links are given by tranthidung in his response.
